desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force pushes toward the bunker where Hoshino is being held captive.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force pushes toward the bunker where Hoshino is being held captive.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force pushes toward the bunker where Hoshino is being held captive.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force pushes toward the bunker where Hoshino is being held captive.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會朝著星野被俘虜的堡壘前進。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会朝着星野被俘虏的堡垒前进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会朝着星野被俘虏的堡垒前进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会朝着星野被俘虏的堡垒前进。

desc.en: After a long hard-fought battle, the Foreclosure Task Force finally brings Hoshino back to safety.
desc.jp: After a long hard-fought battle, the Foreclosure Task Force finally brings Hoshino back to safety.
desc.thai: After a long hard-fought battle, the Foreclosure Task Force finally brings Hoshino back to safety.
desc.ko: After a long hard-fought battle, the Foreclosure Task Force finally brings Hoshino back to safety.
desc.zh_tw: 經過漫長的戰鬥，對策委員會順利成功救出星野。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 经过漫长的战斗，对策委员会顺利成功救出星野。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 经过漫长的战斗，对策委员会顺利成功救出星野。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 经过漫长的战斗，对策委员会顺利成功救出星野。

desc.en: Just when everyone thought they had got rid of PMC, the director suddenly stood in front of them. The director expressed great regret and displeasure at the failure of the plan. Everyone began engaging again.
desc.jp: Just when everyone thought they had got rid of PMC, the director suddenly stood in front of them. The director expressed great regret and displeasure at the failure of the plan. Everyone began engaging again.
desc.thai: Just when everyone thought they had got rid of PMC, the director suddenly stood in front of them. The director expressed great regret and displeasure at the failure of the plan. Everyone began engaging again.
desc.ko: Just when everyone thought they had got rid of PMC, the director suddenly stood in front of them. The director expressed great regret and displeasure at the failure of the plan. Everyone began engaging again.
desc.zh_tw: 就在對策委員會眾人以為甩開PMC時，PMC理事突然又擋在他們面前。理事對計劃泡湯表示非常可惜和不快，眾人立刻開始戰鬥。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在对策委员会众人以为甩开PMC时，PMC理事突然又挡在他们面前。理事对计划泡汤表示非常可惜和不快，众人立刻开始战斗。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在对策委员会众人以为甩开PMC时，PMC理事突然又挡在他们面前。理事对计划泡汤表示非常可惜和不快，众人立刻开始战斗。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在对策委员会众人以为甩开PMC时，PMC理事突然又挡在他们面前。理事对计划泡汤表示非常可惜和不快，众人立刻开始战斗。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.thai: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.ko: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Yume remembered the first time when she saw Hoshino. She praised for Hoshino's cuteness and the ability of being physically strong, and said it was like a dream to be able to meet her - it was, utterly, a miracle. Hoshino didn't think that "daily lives" could be entitled with "miracles", but Senpai denied her opinion.
desc.jp: Yume remembered the first time when she saw Hoshino. She praised for Hoshino's cuteness and the ability of being physically strong, and said it was like a dream to be able to meet her - it was, utterly, a miracle. Hoshino didn't think that "daily lives" could be entitled with "miracles", but Senpai denied her opinion.
desc.thai: Yume remembered the first time when she saw Hoshino. She praised for Hoshino's cuteness and the ability of being physically strong, and said it was like a dream to be able to meet her - it was, utterly, a miracle. Hoshino didn't think that "daily lives" could be entitled with "miracles", but Senpai denied her opinion.
desc.ko: Yume remembered the first time when she saw Hoshino. She praised for Hoshino's cuteness and the ability of being physically strong, and said it was like a dream to be able to meet her - it was, utterly, a miracle. Hoshino didn't think that "daily lives" could be entitled with "miracles", but Senpai denied her opinion.
desc.zh_tw: 夢前輩回憶起自己第一次見到星野時的樣子。她稱讚星野可愛而堅強，說遇到她就像夢一樣——這著實是一場奇蹟。星野並不認為日常可以被稱作為“奇蹟”，但前輩否認了她的說法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梦前辈回忆起自己第一次见到星野时的样子。她称赞星野可爱而坚强，说遇到她就像梦一样——这着实是一场奇迹。星野并不认为日常可以被称作为“奇迹”，但前辈否认了她的说法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 梦前辈回忆起自己第一次见到星野时的样子。她称赞星野可爱而坚强，说遇到她就像梦一样——这着实是一场奇迹。星野并不认为日常可以被称作为“奇迹”，但前辈否认了她的说法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 梦前辈回忆起自己第一次见到星野时的样子。她称赞星野可爱而坚强，说遇到她就像梦一样——这着实是一场奇迹。星野并不认为日常可以被称作为“奇迹”，但前辈否认了她的说法。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.jp: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.thai: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.ko: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.zh_tw: 夢是阿拜多斯前學生會的主席。她曾與星野一起工作，對未來抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一張與星野一起拍的合照上出現過。當前沒有更多關於她的訊息，但有些人認為她可能已經死了，如在第一篇和最終篇中所呈現的一樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force forced the door open. Head buzzing, Hoshino didn't know whether it is dream or reality for her to be able to regain freedom and to hear everyone's voice.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force forced the door open. Head buzzing, Hoshino didn't know whether it is dream or reality for her to be able to regain freedom and to hear everyone's voice.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force forced the door open. Head buzzing, Hoshino didn't know whether it is dream or reality for her to be able to regain freedom and to hear everyone's voice.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force forced the door open. Head buzzing, Hoshino didn't know whether it is dream or reality for her to be able to regain freedom and to hear everyone's voice.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會一行人在外面強行打開了門。星野意識模糊，不知自己的自由和大家的聲音是夢還是現實。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人在外面强行打开了门。星野意识模糊，不知自己的自由和大家的声音是梦还是现实。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会一行人在外面强行打开了门。星野意识模糊，不知自己的自由和大家的声音是梦还是现实。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会一行人在外面强行打开了门。星野意识模糊，不知自己的自由和大家的声音是梦还是现实。

hobby.jp: 家計簿をつけること、骨董品収集

desc.en: In front of Hoshino, there was everyone of the Foreclosure Task Force. Everyone welcomed Hoshino, and Hoshino welcomed everyone. And of course, at the end of the day, Hoshino spoke that line of speech: "I HAVE COME BACK."
desc.jp: In front of Hoshino, there was everyone of the Foreclosure Task Force. Everyone welcomed Hoshino, and Hoshino welcomed everyone. And of course, at the end of the day, Hoshino spoke that line of speech: "I HAVE COME BACK."
desc.thai: In front of Hoshino, there was everyone of the Foreclosure Task Force. Everyone welcomed Hoshino, and Hoshino welcomed everyone. And of course, at the end of the day, Hoshino spoke that line of speech: "I HAVE COME BACK."
desc.ko: In front of Hoshino, there was everyone of the Foreclosure Task Force. Everyone welcomed Hoshino, and Hoshino welcomed everyone. And of course, at the end of the day, Hoshino spoke that line of speech: "I HAVE COME BACK."
desc.zh_tw: 星野面前站著的是對策委員會的大家。大家與星野相互歡迎著，而最終星野也說出了那句臺詞：“我——回——來——了——”
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野面前站着的是对策委员会的大家。大家与星野相互欢迎着，而最终星野也说出了那句台词：“我——回——来——了——”
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野面前站着的是对策委员会的大家。大家与星野相互欢迎着，而最终星野也说出了那句台词：“我——回——来——了——”
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野面前站着的是对策委员会的大家。大家与星野相互欢迎着，而最终星野也说出了那句台词：“我——回——来——了——”

desc.en: With Hoshino's return, everything finally went as usual.
desc.jp: With Hoshino's return, everything finally went as usual.
desc.thai: With Hoshino's return, everything finally went as usual.
desc.ko: With Hoshino's return, everything finally went as usual.

desc.en: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.jp: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.thai: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.ko: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.zh_cn: 《目标为爱》（Target For Love）是蔚蓝档案国际服于开服一周年官方发行的一首单曲，配有英文歌词。本曲在游戏内外均有使用。
desc.zh_tw: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
